long_description: The vintage-inspired Barebones Forest Lantern outputs 325 lumens of adjustable, ambient lighting that can be used around the house or at your campsite. 5W Cree LED outputs anywhere from 1 - 325 lumens to light up surroundings; use the lantern on low when you're reading in your tent or on high when you're hanging around camp. Use the lantern as a power source for charging your smartphone or other small electronics by plugging your device into the lantern's USB port. Built-in rechargeable lithium-ion batteries power the light for 3 hrs. on high and more than 80 hrs. on low. Plug the Barebone Forest Lantern into a USB output on your computer, or use the included AC wall adapter, to recharge the battery in 4 - 6 hrs.
short_description: The vintage-inspired Barebones Forest Lantern outputs 325 lumens of adjustable, ambient lighting that can be used around the house or at your campsite.
